title: Simon Baker looks dapper in a navy blue suit as he attends Longines Challenge Cup in Barcelona
text:
Simon Baker certainly had heads turning when he arrived at the final of the cup the Longines Challenge Cup in Barcelona, Spain on Sunday.

The 50-year-old Australian actor looked every inch the Hollywood star as he cut a suave figure while he posed for awaiting photographers.

The Mentalist star opted for a well-fitted navy blue suit, white button-up collar shirt and matching tie.

Style star! Simon Baker (pictured) looked dapper in a navy blue suit as he attended Longines Challenge Cup in Barcelona on Sunday

Simon completed his chic look in his signature black, thick-rimmed glasses and Longines watch on his left arm.

He drew attention to a golden tan, and his curly locks were styled to perfection.

The Devil Wears Prada star looked to be in good spirits, showing off his signature smile before he embarked ambassador duties.

Fashionable: The 50-year-old Australian actor looked every inch the Hollywood star as he cut a suave figure as he posed for awaiting photographers

At one point, Simon was seen getting escorted by several security guards and minders onto the field to meet the jockeys and pose with the horses.

In another photo, Simon was seen gazing at his posh watch, while chatting to an official member.

As for the event itself, The Longines Global Champions Tour brings together the top show jumpers in the world to compete in prestigious locations for unprecedented prize money.

Specs appeal: Simon completed his chic look in his signature black, thick-rimmed glasses and Longines watch on his left arm

Simon, who is a long-time Longines ambassador, told Vancouver Sun in May last year that his style has 'evolved out of necessity'.

'I travel a lot and have to do varied activities, from catching up with old friends at a bar to dinner with diplomats. It's good to have a sense of yourself and feel comfortable in the way you present no matter the circumstance,' he explained.

The father-of-three added that with his style being 'simple and restrained', he often sports head-to-toe dark blue or grey, comfortable coordinates and T-shirts.
